infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: ReMind needs your location to send reminders when you arrive at or leave specific places.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: ReMind needs your location to show where you are on the map and create location-based reminders.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: ReMind needs background location access to remind you when you arrive at or leave specific places, even when the app is closed.
